entry.title: Thursday: Freezing drizzle. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle and a few flurries ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. Forecast issued 05:31 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
